title: 你会利用人工智能成为更好的思考者，还是愿意让人工智能取代你的思维？
description: 只有严格运用人工智能、使其不断复合认知思维能力的专业人士才能成为长期赢家。
titleZh: 你会利用人工智能成为更好的思考者，还是愿意让人工智能取代你的思维？
titleEn: Will you leverage AI to become a better thinker, or willingly let AI replace your thinking?
descriptionZh: 只有严格运用人工智能、使其不断复合认知思维能力的专业人士才能成为长期赢家。
descriptionEn: Only professionals who harness AI with discipline, enabling it to continuously compound their cognitive thinking abilities, can become long-term winners. Today, IMD Professor of Leadership and Organizational Change Michael Watkins analyzes how to forge AI into cognitive capability, rather than letting it become a crutch for thought.
